trait.name: Invisible in Water
entries: The water weird is {@condition invisible} while fully immersed in water.

trait.name: Water Bound
entries: The water weird dies if it leaves the water to which it is bound or if that water is destroyed.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}) and pulled 5 feet toward the water weird. Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, the water weird tries to drown it, and the water weird can't constrict another target.
